005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIntegerItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.ArrayException;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IArrayItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020
021import java.util.List;
022
023import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
024
025public final class ArrayGet {
026  private static final String NAME = "get";
027  @NonNull
028  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
029      .name(NAME)
030      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_ARRAY)
031      .deterministic()
032      .contextIndependent()
033      .focusIndependent()
034      .argument(IArgument.builder()
035          .name("array")
036          .type(IArrayItem.class)
037          .one()
038          .build())
039      .argument(IArgument.builder()
040          .name("position")
041          .type(IIntegerItem.class)
042          .one()
043          .build())
044      .returnType(IItem.class)
045      .returnZeroOrOne()
046      .functionHandler(ArrayGet::execute)
047      .build();
048
049  private ArrayGet() {
050    // disable construction
051  }
052
053  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
054  @NonNull
055  private static ISequence<?> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
056      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
057      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
058      IItem focus) {
059    IArrayItem<?> array = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
060    IIntegerItem position = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
061
062    return get(array, position).asSequence();
063  }
064
065  /**
066   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
067   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-get">array:get</a>.
068   *
069   * @param <T>
070   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
071   * @param target
072   *          the array of Metapath items that is the target of retrieval
073   * @param positionItem
074   *          the integer position of the item to retrieve
075   * @return the retrieved item
076   * @throws ArrayException
077   *           if the position is not in the range of 1 to array:size
078   */
079  @NonNull
080  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> T get(
081      @NonNull List<T> target,
082      @NonNull IIntegerItem positionItem) {
083    return get(target, positionItem.asInteger().intValue());
084  }
085
086  /**
087   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
088   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-get">array:get</a>.
089   *
090   * @param <T>
091   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
092   * @param target
093   *          the array of Metapath items that is the target of retrieval
094   * @param position
095   *          the integer position of the item to retrieve
096   * @return the retrieved item
097   * @throws ArrayException
098   *           if the position is not in the range of 1 to array:size
099   */
100  @NonNull
101  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> T get(
102      @NonNull List<T> target,
103      int position) {
104    try {
105      return ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(target.get(position - 1));
106    } catch (IndexOutOfBoundsException ex) {
107      throw new ArrayException(
108          ArrayException.INDEX_OUT_OF_BOUNDS,
109          String.format("The index %d is outside the range of values for the array size '%d'.",
110              position,
111              target.size()),
112          ex);
113    }
114  }
115}
